sentences.english: At some altitudes snow never melts.
sentences.chinese: 在有些高度雪从来不融。

sentences.english: But packaging simple and complex in one can be a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 融简单与复杂为一炉，这可是个艰巨的挑战。

sentences.english: Syncretistic pressure can be seen today.
sentences.chinese: 融的压力，可以看出今天。

sentences.english: General Fu Rong attempted to give a counterattack, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 大将苻融试图反击却已经来不及了。

sentences.english: Castle Peak melting of the clean water, the ancient Great Wall as one of the Holy Land tour.
sentences.chinese: 融青山，碧水，古长城为一体的旅游休闲圣地。
